network_auto_ip: !open_cmd_prompt_as_admin &(WAIT_CLICK) netsh interface ip set address "Ethernet" dhcp &(ENTER) &(2000) !close_cmd_prompt
network_ip_0_100: !open_cmd_prompt_as_admin &(WAIT_CLICK) netsh interface ip set address "Ethernet" static 192.168.0.100 255.255.255.0 &(ENTER) &(2000) !close_cmd_prompt
network_ip_100_100: !open_cmd_prompt_as_admin &(WAIT_CLICK) netsh interface ip set address "Ethernet" static 192.168.100.100 255.255.255.0 &(ENTER) &(2000) !close_cmd_prompt
